text: Elattuvalapil Sreedharan (born 12 June 1932) is an Indian engineer and politician. He is known for making public transportration better in India and for managing the Konkan Railway and the Delhi Metro. He was managing director of Delhi Metro Rail Corporation (DMRC) between 1995 and 2012. He is known as the Metro Man. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Indian engineers Category:Indian businesspeople Category:Politicians from Kerala Category:Malayali people
title: E. Sreedharan
